title: San Francisco Maritime National Historical Park: Learn About the Park
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park           Learn About the Park        An aerial view of the park showing the curving Municipal Pier enclosing Aquatic Park cove. Hyde Street Pier and the fleet of historic vessels are on the left. Moving clockwise from the pier are the lawns, beach, and promenade of Aquatic Park. The large, ship-shaped building is the Maritime Museum in the historic Aquatic Park Bathhouse Building. NPS Photo   Â    Looking for more information?
